channel.title: Cansensus on Mountain Doodles
channel.description: Recent content in Cansensus on Mountain Doodles

item.title: Density
item.description: Density in Vancouver has been one of the recurring themese on this blog, and there are many different ways to come at it. We have looked at density in terms of land use to understand how much land is devoted to what purpose in Metro Vancouver and it’s municipalities. We have looked at density in terms of tax density to understand how property tax revenue depends on land use and zoning.
